explanations.reason: The paper focuses on meta-analysis of the relationship between corporate sustainability reporting (CSR) and stock price crash risk (SPCR), and the moderating effects of country-level institutional quality and cultural dimensions. It does not involve any machine learning techniques, algorithms, or models, nor does it discuss any related concepts such as supervised learning, unsupervised learning, neural networks, or large language models. The study is purely based on statistical analysis (mean correlation coefficients and meta-regressions) within the domain of finance and corporate governance.
